about_the_game:
Bosses are never fun, especially the ones that are constantly peering over your shoulder... Good thing that in Death end re;Quest, Shina and the gang fights to kick boss butt! The Extra Boss & Items DLC includes bundles that'll be helpful for Shina's adventure to Odyssia AND an additional Hidden Boss to fight!

The Extra Boss & Items DLC includes:
• Beginner Bundle
    • ""Code Salve"" x20
    • ""High-Elf Draught"" x20
    • ""Ogre Cold Brew"" x20

• Advanced Bundle
    • ""Code Salve2.0"" x20
    • ""Enolef's Ether"" x20
    • ""Ultra Ogre Brew"" x20

• Master Bundle
    •""Guard Bracelet, Lv. 5"" x3
    •""Brawn Ring"" x3
    •""Defense Ring"" x3

• Hidden Boss
    •A special quest has been added! ""Invite from Arata Mizunashi"" This quest can be accepted from the shop

name: Death end re;Quest Extra Boss & Items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1 GB or better graphics card that can support DirectX 12.0 or more
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC

esrb.descriptors:
Blood
Strong Language
Suggestive Themes
Violence

short_description: The Extra Boss & Items DLC includes 3x item bundles and one hidden boss to duke it out!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
